model.name: Damier Azur Bomber Jacket
model.disambiguatingDescription: An essential sporty style elevated with an iconic House signature. This bomber jacket makes a graphic statement in allover Damier Azur printed on soft, shiny satin. The timeless silhouette is revisited with an adjustable collar and lightly padded for coziness. Finished with brass hardware and classic Monogram canvas accents.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 71% Acetate, 29% Viscose
  • Other Material : 75% Polyester, 25% Cotton
  • Lining : 93% Silk, 4% Viscose, 3% Cupro
  • Off-White
  • Regular fit
  • Model wears size 36
  • Model measurements : Bust 30" / 76cm, Height 5'7,5" / 171 cm, Waist 23" / 58cm, Hips 33,5" / 85cm
  • Made in France
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons
